ca.uwaterloo.epad.painting

Class StrokePoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uwaterloo.epad.painting.StrokePoint

  • public class StrokePoint
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a single point in a stroke object. It contains information copied from a Touch object that may be used by a Brush to render the stroke, such as x and y coordinates, motion speed, acceleration, etc.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dmitry Pyryeskin
    See Also:
    Stroke
